fullplot: A scientific experiment unknowingly brings extraterrestrial life forms to the Earth through a laser beam. First is the cigar smoking drake Howard from the duck's planet. A few kids try to keep him from the greedy scientists and help him back to his planet. But then a much less friendly being arrives through the beam...
plot: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.
title: Howard the Duck
writers: Steve Gerber (Marvel comics character: Howard the Duck)
